attributes.action: Do anything they can to help get Barbara Italia Mendez Justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 4th May 2006 in San Salvador Atenco, Mexico State Barbara Italia Mendez was detained, police officers beat her, threatened her and raped her. An official from the State Public Prosecutor's Office refused to register her complaint about the abuse and no medical examination was carried out. The charges she was brought in for were only dropped in April 2008

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
